  2. Staff at Doom maker Id Software vote to unionise  GamesIndustry.biz
  3. id Software workers form wall-to-wall union in response to mass Xbox layoffs  Game Developer
  4. Microsoft’s id Software votes for wall-to-wall union with CWA  GamesBeat
  5. 165 id Software workers have unionized  XboxEra

item.title: Microsoft released KB5072537, KB5071416, KB5072543 Windows 11 Setup & Recovery updates - Neowin
item.description:
1. Microsoft released KB5072537, KB5071416, KB5072543 Windows 11 Setup & Recovery updates  Neowin
  2. User reports claim December Windows 11 security update fixes AMD GPU hanging and driver crashing  Tom's Hardware
  3. Windows 11 update solves AMD GPU issues in several games  OC3D
  4. Windows 11 25H2 is coming to all PCs, whether you like it or not – here's how to get it now  TechRadar
  5. Windows 11 KB5070311 Reportedly Resolves AMD GPU Driver Crashes in Games  Windows Report
